resources.string: This Activity contains list of songs sorted by Artists names alphabeticaly. Pressing on the songs we go to Now Playing Activity and start Playing
This Activity contains list of songs sorted by Albums names alphabeticaly. Pressing on the songs we go to Now Playing Activity and start Playing
This Activity contains list of songs sorted by Songs names alphabeticaly. Pressing on the songs we go to Now Playing Activity and start Playing
This Activity shows current Song Playing
